rukus.text: Muhammad vyhlyadav ni bilʹsh nizh kur'yer yak kur'yery pered tym, yak yo. Vin musytʹ vmerty abo musytʹ pryyikhaty zbytyy, chy ne mohly b vy musytʹ povernutysya nazad na vashykh p'yatakh? Budʹ khto khto povertaye nazad na yoho p'yatakh, ne zavdaye bilʹ BOHU u naymenshomu. BOH nahorodzhuye tsi khto appreciative

Niyakyy kozhnyy ne vmyraye krim BOZHYM vid'yizdom, u predetermined chas. Whoever shukaye vanities tse svit, my dayemo yomu zvidty, ta whoever shukaye vynahorod U maybutnʹomu, my blahoslovlyayemo yoho tam. My nahorodzhuyemo tsi khto appreciative
Bahato proroka maly godly lyudey boryutʹsya razom z yo, bez kolysʹ wavering pid tyskom v im'ya BOHA, ne zrobyly vony vahayutʹsya abo stayutʹ zneokhocheni. BOH lyubytʹ steadfast
Yikhniy tilʹky vysliv, "Nash Lord, probachayutʹ nam nashi hrikhy, ta nashi porushennya, posylyuyutʹ nashu oporu, ta harantuyutʹ nam peremohu nad disbelievers
Otzhe, BOH harantuvav yim vynahorody tse svit, ta krashchi vynahorody U maybutnʹomu. BOH lyubytʹ harnyy doers
